name: Jessie: Mother's sins
description:
Hello, my name is Natalya. I always loved playing adult games but there weren't too much, or the quality was not very good, so I decided to make a game myself. I would like the game not only had interesting content, but also beautiful design and high-quality images. Because english not native language for me, I'm sorry for some mistakes in text but I appreciate any help with fixing some errors.

I'm working on Jessie: Mother's sins, an adult visual novel with choices that influence gameplay.
The game is created with renpy and need a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels at least.

All characters shown in a sexual light in game are 18 or older. No characters shown in game are blood related.These games are made for entertainment purposes only and do not actually reflect my desires or beliefs. These games shouldn't be taken seriously or be viewed by anyone.

Updates

How often can I expect an update?I will be releasing major content updates at least one per month.
Minor updates (bug fixes, that sort of thing) will be released as necessary.
